org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.task.context

Class TaskContextVariableExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.task.context.TaskContextVariableExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class TaskContextVariableExtractor
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class will help you to create a Map containing all variables you need. I will also manage to resolve values following some constraints of VariableSubstitutor class.
    See Also:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getAllNonTaskVariables

        public Map<String,Serializable> getAllNonTaskVariables(TaskContext taskContext)

        Returns:
        Map containing all variables extracted.

        Return all variables available.
        Parameters:
        taskContext - context containing all variables inside.
        taskResult - used to retrieve the result task variables.
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • extractPropagatedVariables

        public Map<String,byte[]> extractPropagatedVariables(TaskContext taskContext)
        Extract variables from the previous task result to be propagated to children tasks in case of internal error.
        Parameters:
        taskContext - contains the information needed to extract.
        Returns:
        a map containing extracted variables or an empty hash if there are no variables or previous tasks.
